title: Face unlock not working (error: Settings Future keeps stopping )
content:
10 days after initial set up,  i got a Can not verify face, try again. message on the lockscreen and the device would only unlock using a secondary unlock method (pattern).  I went into the settings and chose the delete face data option. After that i tried to set up face unlock again. During the set up (before the face capture step) i got a pop up notification (app crash notification) saying Settings Future keeps stopping.  I factory reset the phone and boot up in the phone in safe mode, but the issue persists. Face unlock is unusable on this device.
I contacted the seller and they cant offer a replacement unit, as its not in stock.
Can someone help? Is this a software issue?
